title: NO LP Gas Distribution today (17)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Litro Gas said that it is NOT possible to distribute gas on Friday (17) as well.
An Official to Litro gas said that LP Gas will be distributed only for essential services and factories.
Accordingly, 350 MT of gas will be distributed for essential services.
In the meantime, people are still waiting in queues to purchase gas.
Fuel Crisis: President orders to streamline distribution; Army & STF to provide security to filling stations
